keyMoments.title: Luffy Continues Battle Against Lucci
keyMoments.description: Captain Luffy continues his intense battle against Rob Lucci, using new Gear Third techniques to try to defeat CP9's strongest agent.
keyMoments.significance: The climactic battle of the Enies Lobby arc continues with the crew's captain fighting for Robin's freedom.

keyMoments.title: Half the Crew Trapped in Flooding Tunnels
keyMoments.description: Zoro, Sanji, Nami, Chopper, along with allies Kokoro and Chimney, are trapped in the underground tunnels as Enies Lobby floods.
keyMoments.significance: Shows that even after defeating their CP9 opponents, the crew still faces mortal danger from the island's destruction.

jollyRoger.description: A skull wearing a straw hat with crossed bones behind it

keyMoments.title: Lucci's Past as Young Assassin Revealed
keyMoments.description: The episode reveals that Rob Lucci has been working as a World Government assassin since age 13, when he killed 500 hostages during a mission.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the dark origins of CP9's strongest agent and explains why the organization employs such ruthless methods.

keyMoments.title: Dark Justice Philosophy Explained
keyMoments.description: The episode fully explains CP9's 'Dark Justice' ideology through Lucci's backstory, showing how it differs from Marine justice.
keyMoments.significance: Provides crucial insight into CP9's moral framework and why they're willing to commit atrocities in the name of the World Government.

jollyRoger.description: CP9 has no jolly roger as they are a World Government agency

keyMoments.title: Doberman Recounts Lucci's History
keyMoments.description: Vice-Admiral Doberman tells his subordinates about Rob Lucci's dark past, showing Marine leadership's awareness of CP9's methods.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates that Marine leadership knows about and accepts CP9's brutal tactics.

keyMoments.title: Onigumo Orders Sacrifice of Own Men
keyMoments.description: Vice-Admiral Onigumo orders the bombardment of a Marine ship full of his own men to try to eliminate Luffy, shooting a subordinate who protests.
keyMoments.significance: Shows that 'Absolute Justice' can be as ruthless as CP9's 'Dark Justice,' willing to sacrifice Marines for mission objectives.

jollyRoger.description: The Marine symbol featuring a seagull
